Distracted First Day Jitters Bot with fake creative query

clues_discovered.method: Solved Empathy Lock with Persuasion check (25)

props_used.usage: Unlocked Empathy Lock to access journal contents
Hacked panel to open escape route

encounter_balance.spotlight_notes: Casey dominated at 45.5% (ideal: 33%). Alex underrepresented at 18.2%. Recommend next encounter favor physical challenges.
encounter_balance.skill_diversity_notes: 8 different skills used across 11 checks. Good variety prevents one character from dominating.
encounter_balance.dc_difficulty_notes: Average DC 14.27, with average total 17.55. DCs appropriately challenging but not punishing.
encounter_balance.pacing_notes: 11 meaningful exchanges in 32 minutes (target: 10-12 in 30-35 min). Perfect pacing.

architects.notes: Failed to confiscate journal, lost Rem to Echoes, security breached

echoes.notes: Rem successfully passed journal to players, secured as ally, journal contents revealed

recommendations.spotlight_adjustment: Next encounter should favor Alex (Urban Explorer). Consider Socket's Workshop (physical infiltration) or ventilation system navigation.
recommendations.skill_check_balance: Persuasion was MVP (critical success on Empathy Lock). Ensure future encounters have non-social puzzle solutions to balance spotlight.
recommendations.difficulty_tuning: DCs are well-calibrated. 100% success rate was due to good rolls (avg 12.45 on d20) + reasonable modifiers. Maintain current DC levels.
recommendations.pacing_adjustment: Pacing is perfect. Proactive timeline (3-round bot countdown) created urgency without forcing rushed decisions.

notes: Enhanced playtest following v2.0 protocol. All dice rolls logged with seed 2001 for reproducibility. Spotlight distribution slightly favored Casey (Method Actor) due to encounter design (Empathy Lock puzzle + social negotiations). Recommend balancing with physical/technical encounters for Alex and Ben.
